name: Unto Dust
description:
You're a wanderer through this post-apocalyptic world, and the orb at your side serves as your guide. It holds the memories of a once great warrior and helps you find new challenges and unlock your past. But beware - evil orbs can possess inanimate vessels and use them to achieve greater power. 

There is a furious memory causing havoc. This evil is seeking to relive the past and will stop at nothing to do so. But with the orb's aid and your strength, you must use your skills to outwit the frenzied memory and emerge victorious. Will you be able to complete your first objective and uncover more of your past? 

Move with AD, jump with Space, attack with P

Art by Marslinje

Music and SFX by utherpenpusher

Gameplay by Hanna Kessler
